text: Yo pana bhikkhu suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yo pana bhikkhu suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 12. Should any bhikkhu have a felt (blanket/rug) made of pure black wool, it is to be forfeited and confessed.
๑๒. อนึ่ง ภิกษุใดให้ทำสันถัตแห่งขนเจียมดำล้วน เป็นนิสสัคคิยปาจิตตีย์
12. Should any bhikkhu get a (felted) rug made of pure black goat's wool, this entails expiation with forfeiture.
